_header: I always search and never find
_description: A Riddle poem about time — five lines, abacc

GULHun409.Transcription:
…[I a]ll way serche & neuer fynd[My] most desyre ys farst
                    me fre[Un] hapy chanch dothe me so bynd[Wha]tt was my
                        welthe ys now my woo[For]tune vnkynd ys now my
                    foo
GULHun409.Note:
Written on fragment of leaf at end of volume, written by a hand of end
                    of the fifteenth century.
GULHun409.Editions:
Young,  John,  and  Patrick Henderson Aitken.  
             A Catalogue of the Manuscripts in the Library of the Hunterian
                Museum.
         Glasgow: James Maclehose, 1908: 330.
